column4: alright, hi people my dvd drive stopped working anyone got any hints?
Try another drive, or boot into a liveCD environment. If it's not working out of the BIOS go buy a new one.
My first step would be to just grab an Ubuntu liveCD (or any really) and see if the drive works at all.
it's dead. Just buy a new one, you can find them for less than $20
